B_premag_stray_max.name: Maximum stray field inside the breakdown zone during premagnetisation

B_tf_peak.name: Peak field inside the TF coil winding pack

CS_bmax.name: Maximum peak field to use in CS modules

CS_jmax.name: Maximum current density to use in CS modules

CS_material.name: Conducting material to use for the CS modules

C_Ejima.name: Ejima constant
C_Ejima.source: Input (Ejima, et al., Volt-second analysis and consumption in Doublet III plasmas, Nuclear Fusion 22, 1313 (1982))

F_cs_sepmax.name: Maximum separation force between CS modules

F_cs_ztotmax.name: Maximum total vertical force in the CS stack

F_pf_zmax.name: Maximum vertical force on a single PF coil

PF_bmax.name: Maximum peak field to use in PF modules

PF_jmax.name: Maximum current density to use in PF modules

PF_material.name: Conducting material to use for the PF coils

P_hcd_ss_el.name: Steady-state heating and current drive electrical power

RMTFI.name: RM Technical Feasibility Index
RMTFI.description: Default value. Should not really be 1

TF_E_stored.name: total stored energy in the toroidal field

TF_res_tot.name: Total resistance for TF coil set

T_e_ped.name: Electron temperature at the pedestal
T_e_ped.description: Used in PLASMOD if fixed temperature pedestal model used

bb_min_angle.name: Minimum module angle
bb_min_angle.source: Input (Lorenzo Boccaccini said this in a meeting in 2015, Garching, Germany)
bb_min_angle.description: Sharpest cut of a module possible

bb_pump_eta_el.name: Breeding blanket pumping electrical efficiency
bb_pump_eta_el.source: Input (D.J. Ward, W.E. Han. Results of system studies for DEMO. Report of DEMO study, Task TW6-TRP-002. July 2007)

beta.name: Total ratio of plasma pressure to magnetic pressure

beta_N.name: Normalised ratio of plasma pressure to magnetic pressure

beta_p.name: Ratio of plasma pressure to poloidal magnetic pressure

condrad_cryo_heat.name: Conduction and radiation heat loads on cryogenic components

e_decay_mult.name: Decay heat multiplication factor
e_decay_mult.source: Input (PPCS FWBL Helium Cooled Model P PPCS04 D5part1)
e_decay_mult.description: Quasi-instantaneous energy multiplication; still present when plasma is off

e_mult.name: Energy multiplication factor
e_mult.description: Instantaneous energy multiplication due to neutron multiplication and the like

f_DD_fus.name: Fraction of D-D fusion in total fusion

f_core_rad_fw.name: Fraction of core radiation power that is distributed to the blanket FW

f_fw_aux.name: Fraction of first wall power that goes into auxiliary systems

f_hfs_lower_target.name: Fraction of SOL power deposited on the HFS lower target

f_hfs_upper_target.name: Fraction of SOL power deposited on the HFS upper target (DN only)

f_lfs_lower_target.name: Fraction of SOL power deposited on the LFS lower target

f_lfs_upper_target.name: Fraction of SOL power deposited on the LFS upper target (DN only)

f_sol_ch_fw.name: Fraction of SOL charged particle power that is distributed to the blanket FW

f_sol_rad.name: Fraction of SOL power radiated
f_sol_rad.description: The rest is assumed to be in the form of charged particles

f_sol_rad_fw.name: Fraction of radiated SOL power that is distributed to the blanket FW

fw_psi_n.name: Normalised psi boundary to fit FW to

g_bb_fw.name: Separation between the first wall and the breeding blanket

g_ccs_div.name: Gap between the central column shield and the divertor cassette

g_ccs_fw.name: Gap between the central column shield and the first wall

g_ccs_vv_add.name: Additional gap between the central column shield and the vacuum vessel

g_ccs_vv_inboard.name: Gap between central column shield and the vacuum vessel on the inboard side

g_cr_rs.name: Cryostat VV offset to radiation shield
g_cr_rs.description: Distance away from edge of cryostat VV in all directions

g_cr_ts.name: Gap between the Cryostat and CTS

g_cr_vv.name: Gap between Cryostat and VV ports

g_ib_ts_tf.name: Inboard gap between TS and TF

g_ib_vv_ts.name: Inboard gap between VV and TS

g_ob_ts_tf.name: Outboard gap between TS and TF

g_ob_vv_ts.name: Outboard gap between VV and TS

g_ts_tf_topbot.name: Vessel KOZ offset to TF coils on top and bottom edges

h_cp_top.name: Height of the TF coil inboard Tapered section end

h_tf_max_in.name: Plasma side TF coil maximum height

h_tf_min_in.name: Plasma side TF coil min height

m_gas.name: Gas puff flow rate
m_gas.source: Input (Discussions with Chris Day and Yannick Hörstensmeyer)
m_gas.description: To maintain detachment - no chance of fusion from gas injection

min_OIS_length.name: Minimum length of an inter-coil structure

n_div_cassettes.name: Number of divertor cassettes per sector

n_rs_lab.name: Number of radiation shield labyrinth levels

o_p_cr.name: Port offset from VV to CR

o_p_rs.name: Port offset from VV to RS

p_nb.name: NB launcher power
p_nb.description: Maximum launcher current drive in a port

psi_norm.name: Normalised flux value of strike-point contours

r_ccs.name: Outer radius of the central column shield

r_cp_top.name: Radial Position of Top of TF coil taper

r_cs_corner.name: Corner radius of the CS coil winding pack

r_pf_corner.name: Corner radius of the PF coil winding pack

r_tf_curve.name: Start of the upper curve of domed picture frame shale

r_tf_in.name: Inboard radius of the TF coil inboard leg

r_tf_inboard_corner.name: Corner Radius of TF coil inboard legs

r_tf_inboard_out.name: Outboard Radius of the TF coil inboard leg tapered region

r_tf_outboard_corner.name: Corner Radius of TF coil outboard legs

rs_l_d.name: Radiation shield labyrinth delta
rs_l_d.description: Thickness of a radiation shield penetration neutron labyrinth

rs_l_gap.name: Radiation shield labyrinth gap
rs_l_gap.description: Gap between plug and radiation shield

sigma_tf_case_max.name: Maximum von Mises stress in the TF coil case nose

sigma_tf_wp_max.name: Maximum von Mises stress in the TF coil winding pack nose

tf_fluence.name: Insulation fluence limit for ITER equivalent to 10 MGy

tf_taper_frac.name: Height of straight portion as fraction of total tapered section height

tf_wp_depth.name: TF coil winding pack depth (in y)

tf_wp_width.name: TF coil winding pack radial width

theta_inner_target.name: Angle between flux line tangent at inner strike point and SOL side of inner target

theta_outer_target.name: Angle between flux line tangent at outer strike point and SOL side of outer target

tk_ccs_min.name: Minimum thickness of the central column shield

tk_cs_casing.name: Thickness of the CS coil casing

tk_cs_insulation.name: Thickness of the CS coil insulation

tk_div_cass.name: Minimum thickness between inner divertor profile and cassette

tk_div_cass_in.name: Additional radial thickness on inboard side relative to to inner strike point

tk_pf_casing.name: Thickness of the PF coil casing

tk_pf_insulation.name: Thickness of the PF coil insulation

tk_r_ib_bss.name: Thickness ratio of the inboard blanket back supporting structure

tk_r_ib_bz.name: Thickness ratio of the inboard blanket breeding zone

tk_r_ib_manifold.name: Thickness ratio of the inboard blanket manifold

tk_r_ob_bss.name: Thickness ratio of the outboard blanket back supporting structure

tk_r_ob_bz.name: Thickness ratio of the outboard blanket breeding zone

tk_r_ob_manifold.name: Thickness ratio of the outboard blanket manifold

tk_sh_bot.name: Lower shield thickness
tk_sh_bot.description: DO NOT USE - PROCESS has VV = VV + shield

tk_sh_in.name: Inboard shield thickness
tk_sh_in.description: DO NOT USE - PROCESS has VV = VV + shield

tk_sh_out.name: Outboard shield thickness
tk_sh_out.description: DO NOT USE - PROCESS has VV = VV + shield

tk_sh_top.name: Upper shield thickness
tk_sh_top.description: DO NOT USE - PROCESS has VV = VV + shield

tk_tf_case_out_in.name: TF coil case thickness on the outboard inside

tk_tf_case_out_out.name: TF coil case thickness on the outboard outside

tk_tf_front_ib.name: TF coil inboard steel front plasma-facing

tk_tf_insgap.name: TF coil WP insertion gap
tk_tf_insgap.description: Backfilled with epoxy resin (impregnation). This is an average value; can be less or more due to manufacturing tolerances

tk_tf_ob_casing.name: TF leg conductor casing general thickness

tk_tf_side.name: TF coil inboard case minimum side wall thickness

tk_tf_wp.name: TF coil winding pack radial thickness

tk_tf_wp_y.name: TF coil winding pack toroidal thickness

vv_dpa.name: Vacuum vessel life limit (SS316-LN-IG)
vv_dpa.source: Input (RCC-Mx or whatever it is called)

vvpfrac.name: Fraction of neutrons deposited in VV
vvpfrac.source: Input (Bachmann, probably thanks to P. Pereslavtsev)
vvpfrac.description: simpleneutrons needs a correction for VV n absorbtion

xpt_inner_gap.name: Gap between x-point and inner wall

xpt_outer_gap.name: Gap between x-point and outer wall

z_cryo_ts.name: Half height of outboard cryo TS
